settings:
RENAME THE FILE TO BE Settings.xml INSTEAD OF Settings_Fresh.xml BEFORE USING! ALSO DON'T FORGET TO CHANGE THE TOKEN TO YOUR BOT'S TOKEN! <-->
BOT SETTINGS Token: Token for the bot that's running the program. UseMention: Commands are called via '@Bot ' if true. CommandPrefix: If UseMention is false, commands are called via ''. DeleteUserMessage: If true, the bot deletes the message that the player used to call it. <-->
YOURTOKENHERE true - false
